turns.content: Gautam was referred to me by Mr. Bala Sirigi (The Scientists Laboratory). Bala thought it would be good for both of us to connect. Write a WhatsApp message to Gautam to introduce myself and concreate. Ask him for a call or meeting.

Hi Gautam, this is [Your Name] from Concreate. Mr. Bala Sirigi suggested that we connect and explore potential synergies. Concreate is a cutting-edge digital production studio specialising in creating 3D assets and virtual environments. I would like to know more about your requirements and explore how we can help you with your digital needs. Are you free for a call or meeting sometime this week? Let me know. Thanks!
Rewrite

"Hey Gautam, Bala Sirigi (The Scientists Laboratory) referred you to me and he thought it would be good for us to connect. I am one of the founders of Concreate, a digital production studio. Can we connect over a call or meet in person to discuss how we can collaborate? Looking forward to hearing from you."
Write an email to Ece following up on the proposal document for Concreate creating tutorials for Lokum Tech and discussing the revenue streams from this model.

Subject: Follow-up on Proposal for Tutorials for Lokum Tech

Dear Ece,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the proposal document that I sent you last week regarding Concreate creating tutorials for Lokum Tech.

I was wondering if you had any further questions or concerns about the proposal, or if there were any changes you wanted to make before moving forward. We are excited about the prospect of working with Lokum Tech and would love to discuss the details further.

Note: Ece has to send the proposal to Concreate. I asked Tofi about it and he asked me to follow up with Ece

Subject: Follow-up on Concreate's Proposal for Lokum Tech Tutorials

Dear Ece,

I hope this email finds you in good health and spirits. I am writing to follow up on the proposal document that Concreate sent to Lokum Tech for creating tutorials. Tofi informed me that he had discussed the proposal with you, and you were going to send it to us.

We are excited about the prospect of creating tutorials for Lokum Tech and believe it could
Note: Concreate did not send any document. Concreate is waiting for a proposal document from Ece

Subject: Follow-up on Proposal Document for Tutorials with Lokum Tech

Dear Ece,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to follow up on the proposal document for creating tutorials for Lokum Tech. Tofi mentioned that you would be sending over the proposal document, and I wanted to check if there were any updates on that.

As you know, we are excited about the opportunity to work with Lokum Tech and create these tutorials. We believe that this would be a mutually beneficial partnership and provide value to both our companies. Our team is eagerly waiting to review the proposal document and begin working on the project.

Additionally, we would like to discuss the revenue streams that could be generated from this model. It would be great to have a call to discuss this in more detail and explore how we can maximize the potential of this partnership.

Please let us know if there are any updates on the proposal document and your availability for a call to discuss further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Concreate Team
rewrite

Dear Ece,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up with you regarding the proposal document for Concreate creating tutorials for Lokum Tech. Tofi informed me that you were supposed to send the proposal to us, but we have not received it yet. Could you please let us know the status of the proposal?

Also, I wanted to discuss the revenue streams from this model. We are interested in exploring different options for monetizing the tutorials, and we believe that this could be a mutually beneficial partnership. It would be great to schedule a call to discuss this in more detail.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
what is revenue streams?
Revenue
what is revenue streams?

Revenue streams refer to the ways a business generates revenue or income from its products or services. This can include sales, subscriptions, advertising, licensing, and other sources of revenue. Essentially, it is the various methods a business uses to earn money. Understanding the revenue streams is important for businesses as it helps them identify their main sources of income and plan their future growth and development accordingly.

Write a proposal for Archis Academy being a reseller or sales partner for Concreate.
Mention the percentage numbers

Dear Archis Academy Team,

We at Concreate appreciate the opportunity to work with Archis Academy as a potential reseller or sales partner. Our cutting-edge digital production studio excels in creating 3D assets and virtual environments for various applications such as architectural visualization, digital twin, gaming, metaverses, product visualization, advertising, educational training, virtual and augmented reality experiences.

As per our discussion, we are pleased to offer you a reseller agreement with Concreate. Under this agreement, Archis Academy would sell our digital assets and virtual environments to your clients and provide support for their implementation. We would like to propose a revenue-sharing model of 30% for Archis Academy for each project we execute together.

Our team of talented designers and animators utilize state-of-the-art technology to craft visually captivating and interactive digital assets that cater to the needs of our clients. With the combined experience and expertise of Concreate and Archis Academy, we can offer exceptional digital solutions to your clients and increase both of our revenues.

We believe that this partnership can be mutually beneficial for both of our companies, and we look forward to the opportunity to work with Archis Academy. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns, and we will be happy to discuss further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
Concreate Team
Write a proposal document

Dear [Archis Academy],

We at Concreate are thrilled to have the opportunity to work with you as a reseller or sales partner. We have a lot of experience in creating 3D assets and virtual environments for various applications such as architectural visualisation, digital twin, gaming, metaverses, product visualisation, advertising, educational training, virtual and augmented reality experiences.

Our team of talented designers and animators utilize state-of-the-art technology to craft visually captivating and interactive digital assets that cater to the needs of our clients. Whether it's creating realistic 3D models of real-world objects or designing immersive virtual worlds, Concreate has the proficiency and experience to deliver outstanding results.

We understand that your academy is focused on educating students in the field of architecture and design. Our services could be a great asset for your academy to provide students with more engaging, interactive and realistic experiences in their learning.

We propose that Concreate will be a reseller or sales partner for Archis Academy. Under this agreement, Concreate will provide you with a commission of [X%] on each sale of our services that is generated through your academy.

We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you, and hope to be able to collaborate soon.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Concreate
write a proposal agreement not an email

Proposal Agreement

This Proposal Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into on [DATE] (“Effective Date”) by and between Concreate, having its principal place of business at [ADDRESS] (“Concreate”), and Archis Academy, having its principal place of business at [ADDRESS] (“Archis”).

WHEREAS, Concreate is engaged in the business of creating 3D assets and virtual environments for various applications; and

WHEREAS, Archis is engaged in the business of providing design and architectural training services to students and professionals;

WHEREAS, Archis desires to resell or act as a sales partner for Concreate’s services, and Concreate is willing to engage Archis as a reseller or sales partner for Concreate’s services on the terms and conditions set forth herein.

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements contained herein, and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:

1. Appointment of Reseller or Sales Partner
Concreate hereby appoints Archis as a non-exclusive reseller or sales partner of Concreate’s services.
2. Sales and Commission
Archis shall be entitled to sell Concreate’s services to its customers and clients. For each sale, Archis shall be entitled to a commission of [PERCENTAGE] percent of the total price paid by the customer or client to Concreate for the services.
3. Payment of Commission
Concreate shall pay the commission due to Archis within [NUMBER] days after the end of each calendar month. Payment shall be made by check or direct deposit.
4. Non-Exclusive
This Agreement does not grant Archis any exclusive right to sell Concreate’s services. Concreate reserves the right to sell its services directly to customers and clients, and to engage other resellers or sales partners.
5. Term and Termination
This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until terminated by either party upon [NUMBER] days’ written notice to the other party.
6. Intellectual Property
All intellectual property rights in Concreate’s services shall remain with Concreate. Archis shall not claim any ownership or use of Concreate’s intellectual property.
7. Confidentiality
Archis shall keep all information related to Concreate’s services and customers confidential and shall not disclose such information to any third party.
8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [STATE]. Any disputes arising out of this Agreement shall be resolved in the courts of [STATE].

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written.

CONCREATE

---

[NAME], [TITLE]

ARCHIS ACADEMY

---

[NAME], [TITLE]
